content: **how a free crochet along works** the pattern is available for free during the crochet along a pdf pattern will be available to purchase after the cal is finished the pattern is released in 6 parts 2 parts a week over 3 weeks and each part is available for free on my blog click here 1 to join my fb group for pattern support and to share your progress photos click here 2 to subscribe to my blog to get an email notification sent to you each time i publish a part **cal dates** pattern preamble - 5 october 2024 part 1 - 8 october 2024 part 2 - 11 october 2024 part 3 - 15 october 2024 part 4 - 18 october 2024 part 5 - 22 october 2024 part 6 - 25 october 2024 **what you will crochet** ragdolls have a firmly stuffed head feet and hands and a flat body a cross between a soft toy and a lovey blanket perfect for lots of cuddles **finished size** each ragdoll is 46 cm 18 inches from the top of the head to the bottom of the feet **crochet skill** easy to adventurous beginners you will need a basic knowledge of the amigurumi technique the pattern has helpful hints along the way **terminology** us with metric sizes **what you need** 3 5 mm hook stuffing 2 x 12 mm 1/2 inch safety eyes per ragdoll sewing needle stitch marker scissors pins disappearing ink marker optional **yarn** approximately 450g double knit / light worsted 100% cotton 50 grams/119 metres 100g natural 50g sand 35g burnt orange 60g denim 40g washed denim 20g fern 40g mahogany 15g autumn mix 25g baby yellow 40g orange 1 https //www facebook com/groups/249639565737687 2 https //mandmcrochetdesigns com/subscribe/
